name: Sixloop.GitHub.io
tagline: When recreating the wheel use triangles.
body:
### Welcome to SixLoop.
This is a lean venture by @litzenberger with lots of experiments.  Who knows, maybe one of them will turn into a startup.  Below are some of these experiments.


### End-to-End Marketplace
I love markets.  Buying and selling is so much fun.  I started buying and selling at Oakland Flea market in the 90's right at the peak of Baseball card collecting. ( I just recently donated my collection to a Bay Area charity).   In the late 90's, I moved on to Ebay and reselling collectables.  I sold Star Wars action figures, sports memorabilia, and just recently moved into Hot Wheels.  Ebay hasn't really evolved much over the years and have found lots of issues with collectables ( will write a blog post on this topic soon) and thought it would be a good idea to create an end-to-end marketplace for Hot Wheels.  So check it out my first lean venture under SixLoop, [ZappcarZ.com](http://www.zappcarz.com "ZappcarZ"). 

### Coming Soon
I've seen a few requests on a small service that I am working on.  No details yet but hope to have it up in a few days.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
